Sentencas: Gas-tight seals between metals and ceramics in solid-oxide fuel cells can be fabricated from glasses which enable the crystallization of phases with high thermal expansion coefficients (mostly barium silicates).
Titulo: Barium silicates as high thermal expansion seals for solid oxide fuel cells studied by high-temperature X-ray diffraction (HT-XRD)

Sentencas: This article mainly reports on high-temperature X-ray diffraction studies on these silicates.
Titulo: Barium silicates as high thermal expansion seals for solid oxide fuel cells studied by high-temperature X-ray diffraction (HT-XRD)

Sentencas: It is shown that all barium silicates exhibit thermal expansion coefficients in the range from 10.5 to 15.4 x 10(-6) K(-1) (100-800 degrees C).
Titulo: Barium silicates as high thermal expansion seals for solid oxide fuel cells studied by high-temperature X-ray diffraction (HT-XRD)

Sentencas: The expansions are strongly dependent on the respective crystallographic axis.
Titulo: Barium silicates as high thermal expansion seals for solid oxide fuel cells studied by high-temperature X-ray diffraction (HT-XRD)

Sentencas: The ortho-and metasilicates exhibit the largest thermal expansion coefficients.
Titulo: Barium silicates as high thermal expansion seals for solid oxide fuel cells studied by high-temperature X-ray diffraction (HT-XRD)

Sentencas: The coefficient of thermal expansion of a sealing glass is attributed to the thermal expansion of the crystalline phases and the residual glassy phase.
Titulo: Barium silicates as high thermal expansion seals for solid oxide fuel cells studied by high-temperature X-ray diffraction (HT-XRD)

Sentencas: The phase formation should carefully be controlled also with respect to aging.
Titulo: Barium silicates as high thermal expansion seals for solid oxide fuel cells studied by high-temperature X-ray diffraction (HT-XRD)

Sentencas: Crystalline phases with high coefficients of thermal expansion, such as the barium silicates, are advantageous as components in such sealing glasses.
Titulo: Barium silicates as high thermal expansion seals for solid oxide fuel cells studied by high-temperature X-ray diffraction (HT-XRD)
